original_text: For if I make you sorry, who is he then that maketh me glad, but the same which is made sorry by me?
korean_text: 내가 너희를 근심하게 한다면 내가 근심하게 한 자밖에 나를 기쁘게 할 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: For if I make you sorry
who is he then that maketh me glad
but the same which is made sorry by me?
sentences.korean_translation: 바로 내가 슬프게 만든 자가 아니겠는가?
